      • getJobStatus

        AdminJobStatusResponse getJobStatus(AdminJobStatusRequest jobStatusRequest)
                                    throws KKAdminException
        Retrieve Status Information on the Batch Jobs
        Parameters:
        jobStatusRequest - Defines the jobs to retrieve information about
        Returns:
        AdminJobStatusResponse an object defining the status of the jobs requested
        Throws:
        KKAdminException

      • runBatchJob

        boolean runBatchJob(java.lang.String group,
                  java.lang.String name,
                  java.lang.String[] paramArray)
                    throws KKAdminException
        Executes the batch job with the specified group and name.

        The batch job must be defined as one the existing batch jobs in the system.

        For Quartz jobs, the paramAray is not actually used but it is provided should these parameters be required for overriding the implementation of this method in a custom engine.

        Parameters:
        group - The group of the batch job to be run
        name - The name of the batch job to be executed
        paramArray - A generic set of Strings that can be used for custom purposes.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the job was successfully started, otherwise false
        Throws:
        KKAdminException
